senses: [{"definition":"An absurdity.","example":null},{"definition":"(often preceded by the) The opposition between the human search for meaning in life and the inability to find any; the state or condition in which man exists in an irrational universe and his life has no meaning outside of his existence.","example":null},{"definition":"Contrary to reason or propriety; obviously and flatly opposed to manifest truth; inconsistent with the plain dictates of common sense; logically contradictory; nonsensical; ridiculous; silly.","example":null},{"definition":"Inharmonious; dissonant.","example":null},{"definition":"Having no rational or orderly relationship to people's lives; meaningless; lacking order or value.","example":null},{"definition":"Dealing with absurdism.","example":null}]
